HediffDef.label: decommissioned
HediffDef.description: AI core permanently shutdown and wiped clean.

HediffDef.label: Rebooting
HediffDef.description: Rebooting sequence active in the ai core.

HediffDef.label: unfeeling
HediffDef.description: Modifications to the morality and emotional response sectors of the AI Core, resulting in completely neutral mood and lack of higher functions.

HediffDef.label: recently reprogrammed
HediffDef.description: recently reprogrammer AI core. Compiling and auto-correcting all new software may cause reduced abilities.

HediffDef.label: overclocked
HediffDef.description: Processing sectors of the android's AI core accelerated, resulting in quicker computing of functions but also increased load on hardware.

HediffDef.label: coolant loss
HediffDef.description: Loss of coolant in internal piping, resulting in reduced cooling capacity and overheating of internals.
